entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong random read behaviour in StreamReader #110509
  • [API Proposal]: `TextReader.ReadLines` and `ReadAllLines` #110508

Closed

  • Is it possible to add System.Management for netstandard2.1 and remove System.CodeDom dependencies? #110507
  • Non-english languages bug in terminal in .Net 8 #108918

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Normalization APIs using the spans #110465
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate assertions into natural loops in global morph #110501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow stack size to be configured for native AOT #110455
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added a fix for the build failure when STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT is defined. #110506
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110484
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
